title: Coats: Yarn Red Heart Boutique Sashay Mini Yarn, Pixie
description: COATS YARN-Red Heart Boutique Sashay Mini Yarn. This bulky weight yarn is perfect for all knit and crochet projects. Weight category: 5. Content: 97% acrylic/3% other fibers. Putup: 3.5oz/100g, 42yd/39m. Gauge: 16sx10r = 4in/10cm on size US9/5.5mm knitting needles. Suggested crochet hook size J10/6mm. Dyelotted: we try but are not always able to match dyelots. Care: hand wash, dry flat, do not bleach, do not iron, dry clean with P solvents only. Comes in a variety of colors. Each sold separately. Imported.
